snippet.title: Character Spotlight: Betty Potter
snippet.description:
Betty Potter is one of the members of the Bellevue Cantina; an outdoor bazaar where several patients and/or their family sell goods to help afford their hospital stay.

Betty's son, Adrien, is being treated with anti-rejection drugs for a heart transplant he received at an early age.

Despite all of that, she remains a friendly and upbeat character.
